name: Dinner Tonight: Roasted Cauliflower with Capers
description: When I pulled this from the oven, I was livid. Both the cauliflower and capers came out looking awfully disappointing. And by “awfully disappointing,” I mean “burnt." I just couldn’t believe Martha Stewart, of all people, would construct such a...

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, toss the cauliflower and capers with the oil. Then spread the mixture out on a large roasting pan. Season with salt. Cook for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally so the cauliflower browns evenly.
Remove from the oven and sprinkle with marjoram leaves, if you have them.
